plot: An old Confederate veteran tells how he once engaged in a secret service enterprise, how he penetrated the enemy's line in disguise, how he barely escaped capture by the skin of his teeth and how he finally delivered his message in safety.
title: The Old Soldier's Story
plot_es: An old Confederate veteran tells how he once engaged in a secret service enterprise, how he penetrated the enemy's line in disguise, how he barely escaped capture by the skin of his teeth and how he finally delivered his message in safety.
plot_en: An old Confederate veteran tells how he once engaged in a secret service enterprise, how he penetrated the enemy's line in disguise, how he barely escaped capture by the skin of his teeth and how he finally delivered his message in safety.
